message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your company. Let me know what you think.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I am willing to offer $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but unfortunately $1,050,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,075,000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can make this deal work.

Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and while I appreciate your flexibility, I believe we can find an even better solution. I am willing to offer $1,060,000 for the product. This price is closer to your original asking price but still within my budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
